Desc.entry: A registered charity which works with local community groups and individuals to enable them to take part in managing the local environment in Stocksbridge and Bradfield within South Yorkshire Forest, providing training, tools, support and guidance. Works with schools to develop education projects and opportunities. Undertakes practical conservation work including dry stone walling, tree planting, woodland management, tree surgery, footpath work and fencing. Offers advice on countryside issues. Provides assistance with grant or funding applications for environmental projects. Provides guided and interpretive activities in local green spaces and the wider countryside. Area covered: Middlewood to Underbank, bordered by Barnsley Metropolitan Borough Council and Peak National Park boundaries (the Upper Don zone of South Yorkshire Forest). Companies House Registration No. 4394953.
